remarks: Deduce the identity arrow in a category.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
catidd.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` C ) ) $.
catidd.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( Hom ` C ) ) $.
catidd.o $e |- ( ph -> .x. = ( comp ` C ) ) $.
catidd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
catidd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> .1. e. ( x H x ) ) $.
catidd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B /\ f e. ( y H x ) ) ) -> ( .1. ( <. y , x >. .x. x ) f ) = f ) $.
catidd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B /\ f e. ( x H y ) ) ) -> ( f ( <. x , x >. .x. y ) .1. ) = f ) $.
catidd $p |- ( ph -> ( Id ` C ) = ( x e. B |-> .1. ) ) $.
$d .1. f y $.
$d B x $.
$d C f x y $.
$d f ph x y $.
